metadata.inclusion: Pressing and holding both buttons for 1 to 5 seconds
metadata.exclusion: Pressing and holding both buttons for 5 to 10 seconds when the Moving blind is in the top position
metadata.reset: Pressing both buttons for more than 30 seconds when the Moving blind is anywhere but in the bottom position. WARNING, donâ€™t do this unless you are very sure what you are doing. Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
